node.title: Long stretches of uninterrupted work
node.description: I can do no better work, accomplish no harder task, then when I’m doing so during a long stretch of uninterrupted work.
node.content:
As someone who works from home, I have complete control over my working environment. This control is the most beneficial feature of working from home. It allows me to achieve long stretches of uninterrupted work.

I can do no better work, accomplish no more difficult task, then when I’m doing so during a long stretch of uninterrupted work.

Your email inbox, or slack chat - or whatever it is you are continually being interrupted by - may be necessary for your work. But taking breaks from them will help you do focused work.
